0.name: Chariz
0.description:
I co-founded Chariz: a student-run organization that helps local charities through 3D printing.

I designed the first iteration of the website in Wix, created its logo, wrote of our activities on online blog and designed 3D models in Blender for the exhbitions of the mental health organizations CoolMinds, MindHK and KELY Support Group.

4.name: WebRC
4.description: Helped start the Web@RC project, planning a 13-lesson web development course and contributing to an education website resource
